challenges.name: Unique Words
challenges.description: Given n and then n words, print how many distinct words appear.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Next n lines: one word each.
challenges.output_format: Single integer: count of distinct words.

challenges.name: Word Frequency
challenges.description: Given n and n words, print each distinct word and its frequency sorted lexicographically.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Next n lines: words.

challenges.name: Phone Book
challenges.description: First read integer n. Then n lines with name and phone. Store in a map. Then read integer q and q names; for each, print phone if present, otherwise NOT FOUND.
challenges.input_format: n, then n lines: name phone. Then q, then q lines: name.
challenges.output_format: For each query: phone or NOT FOUND.

challenges.name: Intersection of Two Sets
challenges.description: Given two lists of integers, print how many numbers appear in both lists (set intersection size).
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second: n integers. Third: m. Fourth: m integers.

challenges.name: First Non-Repeating Character
challenges.description: Given string S, find first character that appears exactly once. If none, print -1.

challenges.name: Anagram Checker
challenges.description: Given two lowercase strings a and b, print YES if they are anagrams, else NO.

challenges.name: Top K Frequent Numbers
challenges.description: Given n and array, and k, print k numbers with highest frequency, sorted by frequency desc and value asc for ties.
challenges.input_format: n, then n integers, then k.
challenges.notes: Use HashMap + sort by (freq desc, value asc).

challenges.name: Remove Duplicates, Keep Order
challenges.description: Given n and array, print elements in order of first appearance, removing duplicates.

challenges.name: Group Anagrams Count
challenges.description: Given n words, group them by anagram and print how many groups exist.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Next n lines: words.
challenges.output_format: Single integer: number of anagram groups.
challenges.notes: Normalize word by sorting chars and group by that key (case-insensitive in sample).

challenges.name: Most Frequent Word
challenges.description: Given n and n words, print the word with highest frequency. If tie, print lexicographically smallest.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Next n lines: words.
